recipes.title: Creamy Meatballs & Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Prepare meatballs by combining ground meat, breadcrumbs, and seasoning.
Fry meatballs until golden brown.
Prepare a creamy sauce in a pan and add cooked meatballs.
Combine the sauce and meatballs with the cooked pasta.

recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry diced pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk together eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
Combine the hot spaghetti with the egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve immediately with additional cheese on top.

recipes.title: Penne Arrabbiata
steps: Cook penne pasta until al dente.
Heat olive oil in a pan and saut√© garlic and red chili flakes.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Mix the sauce with the cooked pasta.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
steps: Cook pasta and let it cool.
Chop vegetables like cucumbers, tomatoes, and bell peppers.
Prepare a dressing with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.
Mix the pasta, vegetables, and dressing in a bowl.
Add feta cheese and olives before serving.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
steps: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onions.
Add olives and feta cheese to the bowl.
Prepare a dressing with olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano.
Toss the salad with the dressing.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and dry romaine lettuce.
Prepare croutons by toasting bread cubes with olive oil and garlic.
Mix Caesar dressing with grated Parmesan cheese.
Toss lettuce with the dressing and croutons.
Serve with additional Parmesan on top.

recipes.title: Quinoa & Roasted Vegetable Salad
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast vegetables like zucchini, bell peppers, and onions.
Prepare a dressing with olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs.
Combine quinoa, roasted vegetables, and dressing.
Serve warm or chilled.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Grill chicken breasts until fully cooked.
Chop lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
Slice the grilled chicken into strips.
Prepare a dressing with olive oil, vinegar, and mustard.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and serve.
